title: Nonprofit sees success using motion controls for educational games
text:
Nonprofit sees success using motion controls for educational games 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
New research surfaces today on how nonprofit GameDesk Studios has been experimenting with developing motion-based games to help students bet...
